top_comment.text: Não saquei a da mulher gatonete...﻿
top_comment.author: Yamazake Whitesky

comments.text:
Só para esclarecer. A NET é uma empresa que oferece internet, telefone e tv 
a cabo no sudeste, principalmente. A expressão "gato net" é para quem 
pirateia os serviços dessa empresa. Mas como a expressão já ficou muito 
famosa, já pode ser usada para quem pirateia qualquer serviço, de forma 
geral.
comments.author: Carlos Soares

comments.text: agora eu entendi,valeu!
comments.author: Amanda Ribeiro

comments.text: +Hatsuko Ganrien ah, dessa eu nao sabia, faz sentido agora, valeu :D
comments.author: Yamazake Whitesky

comments.text:
+Yamazake Whitesky
 A expressão ''gato net'' é usado para pessoas q roubam o cabo da net de 
alguém e vendem/usam ilegalmente, gato é um tipo de gíria usada pra quem 
rouba
comments.author: Hatsuko Ganrien

comments.text:
para quem não entendeu, "gato" é um nome que se dá para aquelas 
"gambiarras" que alguns fazem para usar ilegalmente algum serviço, seja 
telefone, internet, TV, água, luz, etc.
comments.author: Mike Pereira

comments.text: +Amanda Farias tambem to perdidaço aqui, o que gato tem a ver com net?

captions.text:
On to "Improbable Scenes",
ladies and gentlemen!

On "Improbable Scenes",
you gave us scene suggestions,

I'll read them and we'll see what
they are going to do with them,

like, for instance:
'Unseen scenes from Master Chef'.

It's a cooking show...
Reality TV!

- And how do you call it?
- Kraft!
Next!
15 minutes!

Nice presentation,
how do you call it?
Finger food!
You gave a nice touch!
And how do you call it?
Food?

People are starving everywhere!
Eat this shit already!

Okay, now we will see...
'Improbable ads for baking powder'.

Want to make more
of your cocaine paste?

This is the best baking powder!
One kilo becomes ten!
Damn, I'm sorry!
Jesus baking powder!
It multiplies even fish!

Baking powder!
Now liquid!

Right, now we will find out 'how
the devil's Barbie would be'!

This is the devil's Barbie,
she draws a pentagram

She cuts a goat,
she worships the devil
Devil not included.

I'm devil's Barbie.
That's why I can turn my neck
360 degrees!

I'm the devil's Barbie.
I don't have cellulite!
Suck it, girls!

- I'm the devil's Barbie, who are you?
- I'm Kenti-Christ!

Something you all must have asked someday:
'What if Batman were from São Paulo'?

Oh, God... Commissioner Gordon,
why Batman isn't coming?

It's the pollution,
he can't see what we're...
It's tough...
Okay... One more.

Batman, we need your help!
Cable-Theft-Woman stroke again!
That Cable-Theft-Woman...

Cable-Theft-Woman actually provides
better service than Cable-Woman!

CIA. BARBIXAS DE HUMOR
presented

IMPROVÁVEL
Probably a good show.

WATCH POLITICAL CAMPAIGN
RICARDO REIS / ÁLVARO CAMPOS

WATCH MORE
IMPROVÁVEL / WITH ANDREI / WITH EDU / SCENES

WATCH MORE
